text: @MarshaBlackburn @realDonaldTrump In the midst of a pandemic you really believe the media gives a tinker's damn about Trump?  His pressers are a joke with incorrect info a 6 yr old can spot.  Think for yourself woman!  We didn't vote you in to lick boots...
